items.title: Ford is starting a battery storage business to power data centers and the grid
items.description: Ford will invest about $2 billion into the new business over the next two years.

items.title: Ford’s next F-150 Lightning will have a gas generator as it pivots away from large EVs
items.description: The company is abandoning plans for a brand new all-electric pickup truck codenamed "T3" and ending production of the battery-only Lightning.

items.title: Creative Commons announces tentative support for AI ‘pay-to-crawl’ systems
items.description: The organization offered support for this idea of an AI marketplace, and suggested several guiding principles.

items.title: Lightspeed raises record $9B in fresh capital
items.description: The massive fund haul will allow the Silicon Valley firm to continue to invest in cash hungry AI startups.

items.title: Merriam-Webster names ‘slop’ the word of the year
items.description: AI-generated content has dominated the internet over the past year, and America's dictionary took note.
